Class PokeBattle

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.PokeBattle

  • public class PokeBattle
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PokeBattle(Trainer trainer, Pokemon pokemon)
      Description: Sets the trainer and pokemon and generates a random number of turns a pokemon will sleep if hit by a sleepdart

    • Constructor Detail

      • PokeBattle

        public PokeBattle(Trainer trainer,
                  Pokemon pokemon)
        Description: Sets the trainer and pokemon and generates a random number of turns a pokemon will sleep if hit by a sleepdart
        Parameters:
        trainer - passes in a trainer instance
        pokemon - passes in a pokemon instance

    • Method Detail

      • checkRun

        public void checkRun()
        Description: Checks if the pokemon runs away. If the pokemon is asleep it skips the check and if the pokemon wakes up from sleep it instantly runs away.

      • throwRock

        public void throwRock()
        Description: Throws a rock at the pokemon. Upping the ability to catch but also the likeliness to run

      • throwBait

        public void throwBait()
        Description: Throws bait at the pokemon. Lowering the ability to catch but also the likeliness to run

      • throwSafariBall

        public void throwSafariBall()
        Description: Throws a SafariBall at the pokemon and checks if it was caught or breaks free. If caught it ends the battle and adds to the list of caught pokemon.

      • useSleepDart

        public void useSleepDart()
        Description: Shoots a sleeping dart at the pokemon, putting it to sleep. This increases the likeliness of it being caught and does not allow it to run away for a certain number of turns. However, when the pokemon wakes up it will instantly run.

      • useMasterBall

        public void useMasterBall()
        Description: Throws a MasterBall at the pokemon, instantly catching it.

      • runAway

        public void runAway()
        Description: checks if you ran away

      • getEndBattle

        public boolean getEndBattle()
        Description: checks if battle ended
        Returns:
        endBattle
